::Dark Rodimus::
=A0
Rodimus only smirks when he realizes what the weapons =
are. He ducks back behind the desk and turns his back towards them. He cove=
rs himself in a fetal position. The grenades detonate whch sheers the desk =
to shrapnel. The room is rocked to it's very core. Rodimus takes some damag=
e and heavy scortching to his back, but his fender takes the brunt of it.
=
=A0
Just as Rodimus was about to think of his next action the floor gave wa=
y. He falls down to the next deck, landing on his knees. Rodimus quickly ro=
lls through and makes a run for it down the hall.
=A0
Rodimus was looking f=
or an outer hull wall that he could blow through.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com, Richard Allen=
 <roborick007@ ...> wrote:
>
> ::Dark Rodimus::
> =A0
> As Rodimus remains =
behind the heavy desk the Minion weapons fire strikes the wall behind him a=
nd the desk.
> =A0
> Rodimus gets Hydras' message over the commlink. He mak=
es a mental note to get right on that when he was done here.
> =A0
> When h=
e finds his opening Rodimus pops up and fires his wrist mounts in rapid fir=
e. The energy blasts cover a wide area with a strafing motion.
> =A0
> The =
tactics, aggression and firepower of Rodimus should be quite the surprise f=
or Scourge and the Minions as they think Rodimus is an Autobot.

Scourge wa=
s indeed taken aback by the ferosity of Rodimus' attack. For while he knew =
that Rodimus was different from the extensive reports from Nightrazor's dow=
nload of this warrior. Seeing it in action was a whole different thing!

Th=
e attack from Rodimus was strong enough and agrresive enough to pin both he=
 and the sweep with him behind their cover.

Then a small blushish purple b=
all sails through the air, followed quickly by another, lobbed from Scourge=
, position.

They bounced and landed near Rodimus' position, small pulsing =
lights at their core. Their function and goal are obvious as the twin fusio=
n grenades count off their last second or two before detonation!

Preston 
=
(Scourge & Sweeps)

<table cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0' border='0' ><tr><td valign='top' style='font: inherit;'><P>::Dark Rodimus::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Rodimus only smirks when he realizes what the weapons are. He ducks back behind the desk and turns his back towards them. He covers himself in a fetal position. The grenades detonate whch sheers the desk to shrapnel. The room is rocked to it's very core. Rodimus takes some damage and heavy scortching to his back, but his fender takes the brunt of it.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Just as Rodimus was about to think of his next action the floor gave way. He falls down to the next deck, landing on his knees. Rodimus quickly rolls through and makes a run for it down the hall.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Rodimus was looking for an outer hull wall that he could blow through.<BR><BR>--- On <B>Tue, 7/1/08, supercyclonus <I><supercyclonus@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></P>

The energy blasts cover a wide area with a strafing motion.<BR>>  <BR>> The tactics, aggression and firepower of Rodimus should be quite the surprise for Scourge and the Minions as they think Rodimus is an Autobot.<BR><BR>Scourge was indeed taken aback by the ferosity of Rodimus' attack. For while he knew that Rodimus was different from the extensive reports from Nightrazor's download of this

Seeing it in action was a whole different thing!<BR><BR>The attack from Rodimus was strong enough and agrresive enough to pin both he and the sweep with him behind their cover.<BR><BR>Then a small blushish purple ball sails through the air, followed quickly by another, lobbed from Scourge, position.<BR><BR>They bounced and landed near Rodimus' position, small pulsing lights at their core.
